effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would earn happiness for any reason, it earns twice that amount instead.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Doubles the happiness earned by the holder.

flavor_text_entries.text:
音色悦耳的铃铛。
携带它的宝可梦会受到安抚，
变得容易和训练家亲密。

心地よい　音色の　鈴。
持たせた　ポケモンは　こころが
やすらぎ　なつきやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting
chime of this bell calms the holder, making
it friendly.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Campanella dal suono rassicurante che calma
chi la usa rendendolo affezionato.

Una campana con un tañido calmante que
reconforta al Pokémon que la lleva y lo vuelve
más amistoso.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen gegeben
werden kann. Es besänftigt den Träger und macht
ihn zutraulicher.

Objet à tenir. Un grelot dont le carillon calme
le porteur et favorise l’amitié.

音色悅耳的鈴鐺。
攜帶它的寶可夢的心情會平靜下來，
變得容易和訓練家親密。

기분 좋은 소리의 방울.
지니게 한 포켓몬은 마음이
편안해져 친밀해지기 쉬워진다.

ここちよい　ねいろの　すず。
もたせた　ポケモンは　こころが
やすらぎ　なつきやすくなる。

心地よい　音色の　鈴。
持たせた　ポケモンは　こころが
やすらぎ　なつきやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The comforting chime of this bell
calms the holder, making it friendly.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Campanella dal suono rassicurante che
calma chi la usa rendendolo amichevole.

Una gruesa y resistente escama que pueden
llevar los Pokémon de tipo Dragón cuando son
capturados.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Es besänftigt und
fördert Sympathie.

Objet à tenir. Un grelot dont le carillon calme
le porteur et favorise l’amitié.

기분 좋은 소리의 방울.
지니게 한 포켓몬은 마음이
편안해져 친밀해지기 쉬워진다.

ここちよい　ねいろの　すず。
もたせた　ポケモンは　こころが
やすらぎ　なつきやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a bell with a comforting chime that
calms the holder and makes it friendly.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a bell with a comforting chime that
calms the holder and makes it friendly.

Objet à tenir. Grelot dont le carillon
calme le porteur et favorise l’amitié.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a bell with a comforting chime that
calms the holder and makes it friendly.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a bell with a comforting chime that
calms the holder and makes it friendly.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a bell with a comforting chime that
calms the holder and makes it friendly.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A bell with a comforting chime that
makes the holder calm and friendly.

A hold item that
calms spirits and
fosters friendship.

A hold item that
calms spirits and
fosters friendship.
